segments.text: Good day . How can we assist you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to get a Letter of Credit . Is this the right window ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It certainly is . Do you have your contract and Import License ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , right here in my brief case . Just a moment , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . What you need to do now is deposit 100 % of the guaranteed funds of your contract into your account with us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's done . There is more than enough to cover the contract amount in our account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . We will have to charge you 250 RIB for that service , though . Could you please fill in this ? Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1
